postnummer.title: Zip-code
postnummer.description: Zip codes within Umeå municipality (zip codeswith fewer than 20 inhabitants are not published for ethical reasons).

livsmedel_inkl_restaurang.title: Food incl. restaurant (kg CO2e/person)
livsmedel_inkl_restaurang.description: kg CO2e/person The sum of the value in the main categories "Livsmedel och alkoholfria drycker"("Food and non-alcoholic beverages"), "Alkoholhaltiga drycker och tobak"("Alcoholic beverages and tobacco") and the subcategory "restauranger, caféer, andra matserveringar, kiosker o automater" ("catering services")

klader_skor.title: Clothes shoes (kg CO2e/person)
klader_skor.description: kg CO2e/person The sum of the value in the main category "Kläder och skor" ( "Clothing and shoes")

bostad_mobler.title: Housing & furniture (kg CO2e/person)
bostad_mobler.description: kg CO2e/person The sum of the value in the main categories for "Bostad, elektricitet, gas och uppvärmning" ("Housing, electricity, gas and heating") and Möbler, inredningsartiklar, hushållsutrustning o förbrukn.varor" ("Furniture, furnishings, household equipment and consumables")

halsa.title: Health (kg CO2e/person)
halsa.description: kg CO2e/person The sum of the value in the main category "Hälsa" ("Health")

transporter.title: Transportation (kg CO2e/person)
transporter.description: kg CO2e/person The sum of the value in the main category "Transporter och fordon" ("Transport and vehicles")

post_telekom.title: Post & Telecom (kg CO2e/person)
post_telekom.description: kg CO2e/person The sum of the value in the main category "Post- och telekommunikation" ("Post and telecommunications")
